name: Our Place in the Evolution of Future Design.
name_original: Our Place in the Evolution of Future Design.
description:
This experience is intended to be a short, simple and non-profited walking simulator investigating the premise of Social Media and our dependencies and connections we develop from it as well as the future digital landscape of Virtual Reality.

As the two are connected in how we will interact with one another our virtual museum will be a small understanding of the concepts and what the future holds for such ideas.

Completed for an education-based task (college/university).

The purpose of the experience is to provide a brief understanding to the player about the undeniably growing influence and connectivity of social media and how we interact with one another on a digital level. 

This then becomes the foundation of what will eventually be a completely immersed experience that involves virtual bodies interacting with a world and each other in a much more direct sense. 

This project does not seek any funding or future plans of payment. Any included reference material is noted and sourced for the benefit of the short experience. All animations were implemented via Mixamo.
